## IF PROGRESS DOESN'T SAVE, PLAY THROUGH http://devmidgard.com/games/ld34 ##

## THIS GAME REQUIRES AN INTERNET CONNECTION ##
## THIS GAME ALSO DEPENDS ON THE PLAYER BASE. AS MORE PEOPLE PLAY IT, THE MORE FIGHTS YOU'LL GET MATCHED FOR! ##

A Tamagotchi game made massive multiplayer and rpg.

Once you start, a pet will be generated for you from one of the 3 races existing at the moment (Nanichi, Eggchi, Blichi).

You will not be able to change the pet, the one you get is the one you shall level up and progress.

The progress is saved PC bound (and maybe browser bound).

Take into the adventure of making your pet grow and defeat the others, reach the adult age and conquer the ranking!

--- STATS AND EXPLANATION ---
Vit: Your Pet will have more health.
Str: Your pet will deal more damage.
Crit: Your pet will have a higher chance of making a critical hit.
Dex: Your pet will miss less times.
